Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to death benefits for members of the uniformed force of the fire department of the city of New York
Summary: Provides for beneficiaries of the death benefits of an eligible uniformed member of the fire department of the city of New York the ability to elect to receive such benefits in a certain lump-sum amount.
LawCode: Amd ยง508, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to death benefits for members of the uniformed force of the fire department of the city of New York
